meanings.definition: A person who lives in or frequents the upper part of a city.
meanings.sent1: The uptowner enjoys the view from their high-rise apartment.
meanings.sent2: Many uptowners prefer the quieter atmosphere of the upper neighborhoods.
meanings.sent3: The uptowner accidentally took the elevator going down instead of up!
meanings.sent4: She felt like an uptowner looking down on the bustling city below.
meanings.sent5: The uptowner's address is always 'uptown' on every letter they receive.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the upper part of a city.
meanings.sent1: The uptowner restaurants offer rooftop dining with stunning views.
meanings.sent2: Living in an uptowner apartment means climbing stairs every day.
meanings.sent3: The uptowner cat loved to perch on the windowsill and watch the street below.
meanings.sent4: The uptowner clouds floated lazily above the skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The uptowner skyline sparkled in the evening light, a sight to behold.
